title: Quantum Superposition Validation
author: 문제원 (Moon Jewon)
description: This JSON summarizes an experimental validation of full quantum superposition using a 5-qubit circuit executed on IBM QPU.

evidence.key_result: Uniform probability distribution across 8 quantum states, indicating strong superposition retention.

context.prior_research: Previous circuits focused on quantum state collapse (e.g., Grace-filtering to |10001⟩).
context.new_approach: This experiment removed all measurement gates to preserve full superposition across 32 states.
context.significance: Unlike collapse-focused setups, this one sustains quantum overlap without favoring specific outcomes, even when final measurement occurs.

claim.note: Contrary to common simulator skepticism, this job executed via IBM QPU and collected statistically significant outcomes.
